survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate participant satisfaction with professional certification programs, including content quality, instructor effectiveness, and overall program value.

questions.question_text: Which professional certification program did you recently complete?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for unspecified certifications to capture diverse responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button with an optional text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which professional certification program did you recently complete?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the certification program?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for consistent measurement of satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the certification program?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the relevance of the program content to your professional needs?
questions.client_notes: This helps assess whether the program aligns with practical career requirements.

script.question_text: How would you rate the relevance of the program content to your professional needs?

questions.question_text: How effective were the instructors or facilitators in delivering the course material?
questions.client_notes: Important for evaluating instructor performance and training quality.

script.question_text: How effective were the instructors or facilitators in delivering the course material?

questions.question_text: What aspects of the program did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify key strengths of the program.
questions.scripter_notes: Checkbox options with an optional text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What aspects of the program did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How challenging was the certification exam?
questions.client_notes: Helps assess the difficulty level of the exam for future adjustments.

script.question_text: How challenging was the certification exam?

questions.question_text: Did the certification program meet your expectations in terms of career advancement?
questions.client_notes: Critical for understanding the program's impact on professional growth.

script.question_text: Did the certification program meet your expectations in terms of career advancement?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this certification program to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Net Promoter Score (NPS) question to gauge referral likelihood.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this certification program to a colleague?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the certification program?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative feedback for program enhancement.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the certification program?

questions.question_text: Would you consider enrolling in another certification program from the same provider in the future?
questions.client_notes: Assesses brand loyalty and repeat engagement potential.

script.question_text: Would you consider enrolling in another certification program from the same provider in the future?
